doss

Interface Blob

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Named, Sized
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TarBlob

    public interface Blob
extends Named, Sized
    A named byte stream of known length that supports random read access.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileTime created()
      Returns the blob's creation date.
      String digest(String algorithm)
      Returns the stored digest of this blob.
      SeekableByteChannel openChannel()
      Opens the blob for reading a returns a seekable byte channel.
      InputStream openStream()
      Opens the blob for reading and returns an InputStream.
      List<String> verify()
      Performs an integrity check of this blob.

      • Methods inherited from interface doss.core.Named

        id

      • Methods inherited from interface doss.core.Sized

        size

    • Method Detail

      • openStream

        InputStream openStream()
                       throws IOException
        Opens the blob for reading and returns an InputStream.
        Returns:
        an InputStream for reading from the blob
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • openChannel

        SeekableByteChannel openChannel()
                                throws IOException
        Opens the blob for reading a returns a seekable byte channel.
        Returns:
        a channel for reading from the blob
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • created

        FileTime created()
                 throws IOException
        Returns the blob's creation date.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • digest

        String digest(String algorithm)
              throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                     IOException
        Returns the stored digest of this blob.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - digest algorithm to use (eg "SHA1", "MD5")
        Returns:
        a hex-encoded digest
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the given digest algorithm is unavailable
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • verify

        List<String> verify()
                    throws IOException
        Performs an integrity check of this blob. Compares the various (database, filesystem, caches etc.) copies of information about this Blob with each other.
        Returns:
        a human readable list of integrity errors
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
